message.body:
$AAPL Key News Update 
Apple is reportedly surprising some employees with massive bonuses up to $180,000 
https://www.benzinga.com/news/21/12/24807471/apple-vs-facebook-poaching-war-leads-to-as-much-as-180k-stock-bonuses-for-engineers-at-iphone-maker

links.title: Apple Vs. Facebook 'Poaching' War Leads To As Much As $180K Stock Bonuses For Engineers At iPhone Maker
links.description: Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) is issuing surprise stock bonuses to its engineers in an effort to prevent poaching from potent rivals such as Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ: FB). What Happened: The bonuses range from $50,000 to as much as $180,000 in some instances, according to a report from Bloomberg Tuesday.

$MSFT - Stock in a very good uptrend with a lot of call activity. Looking for all time highs. Calls above $343.
